app.title: KML/KMZ Extractor from Google My Maps
app.description: Extract KML and KMZ files from Google My Maps easily

form.urlPlaceholder: Paste Google My Maps URL or page containing Google My Maps links...
form.validUrl: Valid Google My Maps URL detected!
form.invalidUrlHelp: The URL you entered is not properly formatted. Please check and try again.
form.invalidGoogleMapsHelp: This looks like a Google Maps URL but couldn't extract the map ID. Please check the URL.
form.validUrlNotGoogle: Valid URL detected - possible scan for Google Maps links on it...
form.scrapingPageHelp: We'll try to find Google My Maps links on this page.

download.title: Download Options
download.kmzDesc: Compressed format with full icon support

scraped.title: Found Google Maps URLs
scraped.scanning: Scanning page for Google Maps links...
scraped.found: Found {count} Google Maps URL(s) on this page:
scraped.notFoundHelp: The page doesn't contain any recognizable Google MyMaps links.

googleMaps.title: Google MyMaps Actions
googleMaps.description: Your Google MyMaps URL is ready. You can visit the map or copy the URL to share:

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS
